00024 class BaseArray

00062 template <class T>
00063 class Array : public BaseArray
00064 {
00065 public:
00066    friend void Swap<T>(Array<T> &, Array<T> &);
00067 
00069    inline Array(int asize = 0, int ainc = 0)
00070       : BaseArray(asize, ainc, sizeof (T)) { }
00071 
00075    inline Array(T *_data, int asize, int ainc = 0)
00076    { data = _data; size = asize; allocsize = -asize; inc = ainc; }
00077 
00079    inline ~Array() { }
00080 
00082    inline operator T *() { return (T *)data; }
00083 
00085    inline T *GetData() { return (T *)data; }
00086 
00088    inline void StealData(T **p)
00089    { *p = (T*)data; data = 0; size = allocsize = 0; }
00090 
00092    inline void LoseData() { data = 0; size = allocsize = 0; }
00093 
00095    void MakeDataOwner() { allocsize = abs(allocsize); }
00096 
00098    inline int Size() const { return size; };
00099 
00101    inline void SetSize(int nsize);
00102 
00104    inline T & operator[](int i);
00105 
00107    inline const T &operator[](int i) const;
00108 
00110    inline int Append(const T & el);
00111 
00113    inline int Append(const Array<T> &els);
00114 
00116    inline int Prepend(const T &el);
00117 
00119    inline T &Last();
00120 
00122    inline int Union(const T & el);
00123 
00125    inline void DeleteLast() { size--; }
00126 
00128    inline void DeleteFirst(const T &el);
00129 
00131    inline void DeleteAll();
00132 
00134    inline void Copy(Array &copy)
00135    {
00136       copy.SetSize(Size());
00137       memcpy(copy.GetData(), GetData(), Size()*sizeof(T));
00138    }
00139 
00140    inline void GetSubArray(int offset, int sa_size, Array<T> &sa);
00141 
00143    void Print(ostream &out, int width);
00144 
00146    void Save(ostream &out);
00147

00165 template <class T>
00166 inline void Swap(Array<T> &a, Array<T> &b)
00167 {
00168    int   s;
00169    void *data;
00170 
00171    data = a.data;   a.data = b.data;           b.data = data;
00172    s = a.size;      a.size = b.size;           b.size = s;
00173    s = a.allocsize; a.allocsize = b.allocsize; b.allocsize = s;
00174    s = a.inc;       a.inc = b.inc;             b.inc = s;
00175 }
00176 
00177 template <class T>
00178 inline void Array<T>::SetSize(int nsize)
00179 {
00180    if (nsize > abs(allocsize))
00181       GrowSize(nsize, sizeof(T));
00182    size = nsize;
00183 }
00184 
00185 template <class T>
00186 inline T &Array<T>::operator[](int i)
00187 {
00188 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
00189    if (i < 0 || i >= size)
00190    {
00191       cerr << "Access element " << i << " of array, size = " << size << endl;
00192       mfem_error();
00193    }
00194 #endif
00195    return ((T*)data)[i];
00196 }
00197 
00198 template <class T>
00199 inline const T &Array<T>::operator[](int i) const
00200 {
00201 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
00202    if (i < 0 || i >= size)
00203    {
00204       cerr << "Access element " << i << " of array, size = " << size << endl;
00205       mfem_error();
00206    }
00207 #endif
00208    return ((T*)data)[i];
00209 }

00211 template <class T>
00212 inline int Array<T>::Append(const T &el)
00213 {
00214    SetSize(size+1);
00215    ((T*)data)[size-1] = el;
00216    return size;
00217 }
00218 
00219 template <class T>
00220 inline int Array<T>::Append(const Array<T> & els)
00221 {
00222    int old_size = size;
00223 
00224    SetSize(size + els.Size());
00225    for (int i = 0; i < els.Size(); i++)
00226       ((T*)data)[old_size+i] = els[i];
00227    return size;
00228 }
00229 
00230 
00231 template <class T>
00232 inline int Array<T>::Prepend(const T &el)
00233 {
00234    SetSize(size+1);
00235    for (int i = size-1; i > 0; i--)
00236       ((T*)data)[i] = ((T*)data)[i-1];
00237    ((T*)data)[0] = el;
00238    return size;
00239 }
00240 
00241 
00242 template <class T>
00243 inline T &Array<T>::Last()
00244 {
00245 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
00246    if (size < 1)
00247       mfem_error("Array<T>::Last()");
00248 #endif
00249    return ((T*)data)[size-1];
00250 }
00251 
00252 template <class T>
00253 inline int Array<T>::Union(const T &el)
00254 {
00255    int i = 0;
00256    while ((i < size) && (((T*)data)[i] != el)) i++;
00257    if (i == size)
00258       Append(el);
00259    return i;
00260 }
00261 
00262 template <class T>
00263 inline void Array<T>::DeleteFirst(const T &el)
00264 {
00265    for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00266       if (((T*)data)[i] == el)
00267       {
00268          for (i++; i < size; i++)
00269             ((T*)data)[i-1] = ((T*)data)[i];
00270          size--;
00271          return;
00272       }
00273 }
00274 
00275 template <class T>
00276 inline void Array<T>::DeleteAll()
00277 {
00278    if (allocsize > 0)
00279       delete [] (char*)data;
00280    data = NULL;
00281    size = allocsize = 0;
00282 }
00283 
00284 template <class T>
00285 inline void Array<T>::GetSubArray(int offset, int sa_size, Array<T> &sa)
00286 {
00287    sa.SetSize(sa_size);
00288    for (int i = 0; i < sa_size; i++)
00289       sa[i] = (*this)[offset+i];
00290 }
00291 
00292 template <class T>
00293 inline void Array<T>::operator=(const T &a)
00294 {
00295    for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00296       ((T*)data)[i] = a;
00297 }
